entry.string: 1.1 Grant rights for an unregistered user
entry.translation: 1.1 Grunt reeghts fur un unregeestered user

entry.string: Unregistered users have their own set of rights. By default, unregistered users may view existing entries only. You may grant unregistered users the rights to edit and delete records created by other unregistered users only. Administrators may view / edit / delete any record created by an unregistered user.
entry.translation: Unregeestered users hefe-a zeeur oovn set ooff reeghts. By deffoolt, unregeestered users mey feeoo ixeesting intreees oonly. Bork bork bork! Yuoo mey grunt unregeestered users zee reeghts tu ideet und delete-a recurds creeted by oozeer unregeestered users oonly.Edmeenistreturs mey feeoo / ideet / delete-a uny recurd creeted by un unregeestered user.

entry.string: 1.2 Grant right for registered users
entry.translation: 1.2 Grunt reeght fur regeestered users

entry.string: Registered users have their own set of rights. By default, registered users can create records, view records, and delete records. You can restrict access by deselecting grants. Registered users can edit records created by that user account only. All other records are view only. Records marked as private can be viewed only by the user that created the record and no one else save Administrators. Administrators may view / edit / delete any record created by a registered user.
entry.translation: Regeestered users hefe-a zeeur oovn set ooff reeghts. By deffoolt, regeestered users cun creete-a recurds, feeoo recurds, und delete-a recurds. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Yuoo cun restreect eccess by deselecteeng grunts. Regeestered users cun ideet recurds creeted by thet user eccuoont oonly. Ell oozeer recurds ere-a feeoo oonly. Recurds merked es preefete-a cun be-a feeooed oonly by zee user thet creeted zee recurd und nu oone-a ilse-a sefe-a Edmeenistreturs. Edmeenistreturs mey feeoo / ideet / delete-a uny recurd creeted by a regeestered user. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: 2.1 Title of this Address Book
entry.translation: 2.1 Teetle-a ooff thees Eddress Buuk

entry.string: Enter the title which will appear to all users.
entry.translation: Enter zee teetle-a vheech veell eppeer tu ell users.

entry.string: 2.3 Default and Alternate sort order / List View
entry.translation: 2.3 Deffoolt und Elternete-a surt oorder / Leest Feeoo

entry.string: Select two columns of your choice. This setting affects not only the sort order but also the display of columns in the list view. Users are allowed to select between the Default and Alternate sort orders.
entry.translation: Select tvu culoomns ooff yuoor chueece-a. Thees setteeng effffects nut oonly zee surt oorder boot elsu zee deespley ooff culoomns in zee leest feeoo. Users ere-a ellooed tu select betveee zee Deffoolt und Elternete-a surt oorders. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: 2.4 Name display in list view and sort order for name information
entry.translation: 2.4 Neme-a deespley in leest feeoo und surt oorder fur neme-a inffurmeshun

entry.string: This setting is for the sort order and display of names in the list view. You can change the default «Last Name, First Name» to «First Name Last Name», which is default in some countries.
entry.translation: Thees setteeng is fur zee surt oorder und deespley ooff nemes in zee leest feeoo. Yuoo cun chunge-a zee deffoolt «Lest Neme-a, Furst Neme-a» tu «Furst Neme-a Lest Neme-a», vheech is deffoolt in sume-a cuoontreees.

entry.string: 2.5 Special character (Umlauts) replacement for sort columns
entry.translation: 2.5 Speceeel cherecter (Umloots) replecement fur surt culoomns

entry.string: MySQL 3.x uses the Latin-1 character set as default. Most users have no permission to change these settings. Therefore names and companies are now stored in special sort columns for correct sorting when special characters (Umlauts) are used. There is an admin setting where you can set up the character replacement to correct the sort for each language.
entry.translation: MySQL 3.x uses zee Leteen-1 cherecter set es deffoolt. Um de hur de hur de hur. Must users hefe-a nu permeessiun tu chunge-a zeese-a setteengs. Zeereffure-a nemes und cumpuneees ere-a noo stured in speceeel surt culoomns fur currect surteeng vhee speceeel cherecters (Umloots) ere-a used. Bork bork bork! Zeere-a is un edmeen setteeng vhere-a yuoo cun set up zee cherecter replecement tu currect zee surt fur iech lungooege-a.

entry.string: 2.6 Personal address book mode
entry.translation: 2.6 Persunel eddress buuk mude

entry.string: The Address Book may be used as a Global AddressBook (unchecked by default) or a Personal AddressBook (checked). As a Global AddressBook all users with access may view records that are NOT marked Private. As a Personal AddressBook users may only view entries they have created and unregistered users may not view or create any entries.
entry.translation: Zee Eddress Buuk mey be-a used es a Glubel EddressBuuk (unchecked by deffoolt) oor a Persunel EddressBuuk (checked). Es a Glubel EddressBuuk ell users veet eccess mey feeoo recurds thet ere-a NOT merked Preefete-a. Es a Persunel EddressBuuk users mey oonly feeoo intreees zeey hefe-a creeted und unregeestered users mey nut feeoo oor creete-a uny intreees.

entry.string: 2.7 Do you want to use a prefix field?
entry.translation: 2.7 Du yuoo vunt tu use-a a preffeex feeeld?

entry.string: Prefix/Title (Mr. Mrs. etc.). Values can be set in
entry.translation: Preffeex/Teetle-a (Mr. Mrs. itc.). Felooes cun be-a set in

entry.string: Administration Panel and are optionally selected via a drop-down list when creating / editing an entry. This field is hidden by default.
entry.translation: Edmeenistreshun Punel und ere-a oopshunelly selected feea a drup-doon leest vhee creeteeng / ideeting un intry. Thees feeeld is heeddee by deffoolt.

entry.string: 2.8 Do you want to use images/logos?
entry.translation: 2.8 Du yuoo vunt tu use-a imeges/lugus?

entry.string: Administrators will see a selection box of all files in the xarimages directory of AddressBook and can assign it to a record. The picture is shown in the upper right of the detail page. Currently, all pictures must be manually uploaded into the xarimages directory of AddressBook. This field is hidden by default.
entry.translation: Edmeenistreturs veell see-a a selecshun bux ooff ell feeles in zee xereemeges durectury ooff EddressBuuk und cun esseegn it tu a recurd. Bork bork bork! Zee peectoore-a is shoon in zee upper reeght ooff zee deteeel pege-a. Coorrently, ell peectoores moost be-a munooelly uplueded intu zee xereemeges durectury ooff EddressBuuk. Thees feeeld is heeddee by deffoolt.

entry.string: 2.9 Disable the menu
entry.translation: 2.9 Deeseble-a zee menoo

entry.string: If you want to use the AddressBook as a simple contact list, you might want to disable the menu completely. You can also disable it for guests only. Note, Administrators always see the full menu, regardless of this setting.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo vunt tu use-a zee EddressBuuk es a seemple-a cuntect leest, yuoo meeght vunt tu deeseble-a zee menoo cumpletely. Yuoo cun elsu deeseble-a it fur gooests oonly. Nute-a, Edmeenistreturs elveys see-a zee fooll menoo, regerdless ooff thees setteeng.

entry.string: 2.10 Disable the second line of the main menu
entry.translation: 2.10 Deeseble-a zee secund leene-a ooff zee meeen menoo

entry.string: This hides the second menu line for all users who DO NOT have edit access. Users still have access to the categories, sort order and the search field, but not access to Private records, A-Z / Complete list view switch, and the Add New Record link.
entry.translation: Thees heedes zee secund menoo leene-a fur ell users vhu DO NOT hefe-a ideet eccess. Um gesh dee bork, bork! Users steell hefe-a eccess tu zee cetegureees, surt oorder und zee seerch feeeld, boot nut eccess tu Preefete-a recurds, A-Z / Cumplete-a leest feeoo sveetch, und zee Edd Noo Recurd leenk.

entry.string: 2.11 Show zip before city
entry.translation: 2.11 Shoo zeep beffure-a ceety

entry.string: In Europe the postal code (zip in USA) is shown before the city. This option is off by default.
entry.translation: In Ioorupe-a zee pustel cude-a (zeep in USA) is shoon beffure-a zee ceety. Thees oopshun is ooffff by deffoolt. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: 2.12 Records viewed per page
entry.translation: 2.12 Recurds feeooed per pege

entry.string: Pick your number between 1 and ??
entry.translation: Peeck yuoor noomber betveee 1 und ??

entry.string: 3.1 Custom tab
entry.translation: 3.1 Coostum teb

entry.string: Name of the Custom Fields tab and the headline for custom fields in the detail page. Leave it blank, if you do not use custom fields.
entry.translation: Neme-a ooff zee Coostum Feeelds teb und zee heedleene-a fur coostum feeelds in zee deteeel pege-a. Leefe-a it blunk, iff yuoo du nut use-a coostum feeelds. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: 3.2 Width of TEXTAREA fields
entry.translation: 3.2 Veedt ooff TEXTEREA feeelds

entry.string: TEXTAREA field width can change depending on the CSS of your theme. Sometimes this results in a very bad layout of your form. You can set the html COLS of a TEXTAREA field. Valid size ranges from 4 to 100.
entry.translation: TEXTEREA feeeld veedt cun chunge-a dependeeng oon zee CSS ooff yuoor zeeme-a. Sumeteemes thees resoolts in a fery bed leyuoot ooff yuoor furm. Yuoo cun set zee html COLS ooff a TEXTEREA feeeld. Bork bork bork! Feleed seeze-a runges frum 4 tu 100.

entry.string: 3.3 Format for date entries
entry.translation: 3.3 Furmet fur dete-a intreees

entry.string: Select the format for date entry and display. Only two options at this time, MM.DD.YYYY and DD.MM.YYYY.
entry.translation: Select zee furmet fur dete-a intry und deespley. Bork bork bork! Oonly tvu oopshuns et thees teeme-a, MM.DD.YYYY und DD.MM.YYYY.

entry.string: 3.4 Format for numeric values
entry.translation: 3.4 Furmet fur noomereec felooes

entry.string: Select the format for numeric entry and display. Only two options at this time, 9,999.00 and 9.999,00
entry.translation: Select zee furmet fur noomereec intry und deespley. Bork bork bork! Oonly tvu oopshuns et thees teeme-a, 9,999.00 und 9.999,00

entry.string: 4.1 Send error reports to Site Admin
entry.translation: 4.1 Send irrur repurts tu Seete-a Edmeen

entry.string: This option enables error messages to be emailed directly to the site administrator email account. Uncheck to disable this feature.
entry.translation: Thees oopshun inebles irrur messeges tu be-a imeeeled durectly tu zee seete-a edmeenistretur imeeel eccuoont. Um de hur de hur de hur. Uncheck tu deeseble-a thees feetoore-a.

entry.string: 4.2 Alternate Site Admin email address
entry.translation: 4.2 Elternete-a Seete-a Edmeen imeeel eddress

entry.string: Choose an alternate email address if the official Site Admin does not wish to receive AddressBook error notifications.
entry.translation: Chuuse-a un elternete-a imeeel eddress iff zee ooffffeeciel Seete-a Edmeen dues nut veesh tu receeefe-a EddressBuuk irrur nuteefficeshuns.

entry.string: 4.3 Send error reports to AddressBook Quality Control
entry.translation: 4.3 Send irrur repurts tu EddressBuuk Qooeleety Cuntrul

entry.string: This option sends an email directly to the AddressBook development team with the error message, date and time of occurrence, and the fully qualified host name of the server running the AddressBook module. NO OTHER INFORMATION IS SENT. This information is used solely for the purpose of fixing issues encountered in the AddressBook module. Uncheck to disable this feature.
entry.translation: Thees oopshun sends un imeeel durectly tu zee EddressBuuk defelupment teem veet zee irrur messege-a, dete-a und teeme-a ooff ooccoorrence-a, und zee foolly qooeleeffied hust neme-a ooff zee serfer roonneeng zee EddressBuuk mudoole-a. NO OoTHER INFORMETION IS SENT. Thees inffurmeshun is used sulely fur zee poorpuse-a ooff feexing issooes incuoontered in zee EddressBuuk mudoole-a. Uncheck tu deeseble-a thees feetoore-a.
